                                        Position 4

                                        MICHELLE DOTSCH

                                        Contact Phone: 425-758-4398
                                        E-mail: michelle.dotsch@edmondswa.gov
                                        Term Expires: 12/31/2027

                                        2025 COUNCIL COMMITTEE:

                                        Committee A (Chair) 

                                        2025 COUNCIL LIAISON ASSIGNMENTS:

                                        Affordable Housing Alliance

                                        WRIA 8  Salmon Recovery
